Echoes of the Past 4: The Revenge of the Witch Collector's Edition 


Save the kingdom of Orion in Echoes of the Past: The Revenge of the Witch! Once again black powers has seized the land and this time the witch is more determined than ever to take her revenge on you. The entire city is gripped by fear and it's up to you to save them, and yourself. Exorcize the evil and defeat the witch once and for all!
